responses: You can use this website to make donations for poor people in need of medicine. You can use this website to predict the disease you may have based on the symptoms that your facing
This Website is used to make donations to the poor, and also to predict the disease you may have based on the symptoms that your facing

To predict the disease you may have based on the symptoms that your facing, you can click on the predict disease button and enter the symptoms that your facing. To make donations to the poor, you can click on the donate button and enter the amount you want to donate.
